data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Sang-Hyeop Chae has awarded Seoul a corner.
In the minute 2, Hwang Hyun-soo (Seoul) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Busan defenders.
Seoul takes a corner from the right.
Seoul's Young Sun Yun attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 2, Ball goes out of play for a Busan goal kick.
Ball safe as Seoul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Seoul at World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Busan in the half of Seoul.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Busan.
Seoul needs to be cautious. Busan have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 6, Throw-in high up the field for Busan in Seoul.
Sang-Hyeop Chae awards the home team a throw-in.
Jung Han-min of Seoul smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 7, Corner awarded to Seoul.
Free kick Seoul.
Seoul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, Seoul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a throw-in for Seoul, close to Busan's area.
Throw-in for Busan in their own half.
In the minute 11, Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Busan in their own half.
Free kick for Busan in their own half.
Throw-in Seoul.
In the minute 12, Can Busan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Seoul's half?
Sang-Hyeop Chae has awarded Busan a corner.
Busan are pushing forward but Kim Jung-hyun's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 13, Seoul have a goal kick.
Busan are coming forward and Lee Dong-jun gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Seoul at World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 16, Busan's Lee Jung-hyub is on target but unsuccessful.
Busan takes a corner from the left.
Goal! Lee Kyu-seong gives Busan a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 19, Ball safe as Busan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Busan at World Cup Stadium.
Can Seoul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Busan's half?
In the minute 21, Throw-in Busan.
Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Seoul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Seoul in their own half.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Seoul in their own half.
Corner awarded to Seoul.
In the minute 26, Hwang Hyun-soo (Seoul) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Sang-Hyeop Chae awards Busan a goal kick.
Seoul to take a throw-in in Busan territory.
In the minute 28, Sang-Hyeop Chae has awarded Seoul a corner.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seoul.
Osmar Barba of Seoul gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 29, Busan have a goal kick.
Sang-Hyeop Chae awards the home team a throw-in.
Seoul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 32, Young Sun Yun (Seoul) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Seoul.
Seoul pushes forward through Yoon Jong-gyu, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 34, Park Chu-young (Seoul) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seoul.
Goal kick for Busan at World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 37, Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a Seoul throw-in in Busan's half.
Seoul takes a corner from the right.
In Seoul a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Seoul goal kick.
In the minute 41, Park Jun-kang is replacing Lee Sang-jun for the away team.
Seoul's Jo Yeong-uk misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 45, Sang-Hyeop Chae awards Busan a goal kick.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Se Jong Ju is on a sub for Kim Won-sik for Seoul.
Seoul will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Busan.
In the minute 48, Goal! Busan extend their lead to 0-2 through Park Jong-woo.
Ball goes out of play for a Busan goal kick.
Throw-in Busan.
In the minute 50, Busan pushes forward through Lee Kyu-seong, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Busan.
Busan are pushing forward but Kim Seung-jun's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 52, Sang-Hyeop Chae awards Seoul a goal kick.
Han Seung-gyu of Seoul smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Sang-Hyeop Chae has awarded Seoul a corner.
In the minute 54, Goal kick for Busan at World Cup Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seoul.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Seoul in the half of Busan.
Park Jun-kang is booked for the away team.
Osmar Barba (Seoul) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 59, Ball safe as Seoul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Busan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seoul's half?
The home team replace Han Seung-gyu with Yun Ju-tae.
In the minute 61, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Seoul at World Cup Stadium.
Throw-in for Seoul in their own half.
In the minute 62, Seoul have a dangerous throw-in.
Seoul's Park Chu-young is on target but unsuccessful.
Seoul drives forward and Yun Ju-tae gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 64, Seoul takes a corner from the left.
Throw-in for Seoul close to the penalty box.
Seoul have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 65, Seoul pushes forward through Yun Ju-tae, whose finish on goal is saved.
Seoul takes a corner from the right.
Goal! Seoul reduce the deficit to 1-2 through Jung Han-min.
In the minute 67, Sang-Hyeop Chae awards the home team a throw-in.
Busan make their second substitution with Romulo replacing Kim Seung-jun.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Busan in their own half.
Yun Ju-tae (Seoul) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick for Busan in their own half.
Seoul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 72, Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Seoul.
Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sang-Hyeop Chae awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 74, In Seoul a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Busan in their own half.
Throw-in for Seoul at World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 77, Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Busan in their own half.
Busan's Romulo is on target but unsuccessful.
Young Sun Yun (Seoul) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 80, Busan have a goal kick.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Seoul in their own half.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a Busan throw-in in Seoul's half.
In the minute 84, Lee Dong-jun is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Han Chan-hee is on a sub for Osmar Barba for Seoul.
Seoul's Jung Han-min attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 85, Ball goes out of play for a Busan goal kick.
Free kick for Busan in their own half.
In the minute 86, Seoul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lee Dong-jun, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Gustavo Vintecinco is the substitute for Busan.
Sang-Hyeop Chae awards Busan a goal kick.
Romulo of Busan gets in a strike, but is off target.
Seoul have a goal kick.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Seoul are coming forward and Yun Ju-tae gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Busan at World Cup Stadium.
Seoul are coming forward and Han Chan-hee gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seoul.
Sang-Hyeop Chae has awarded Seoul a corner.
Han Chan-hee of Seoul smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
It's 1-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
